S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-2065 Network and embedded difference in SQLSTATE and message when Connection.close() with open transaction
Patch derby-2065_1. As a result of this patch SQLState.LANG_INVALID_TRANSACTION_STATE and the testsing framework's equivalent SQLStateConstants.INVALID_TRANSACTION_STATE_NO_SUBCLASS are now unused, but I leave them declared since the constant 25000 is defined in the standard and may find some future use.
Patch committed by Jorgen Loland.
